name: BEAT! BATTLE! SABER!
description:
RHYTHM BATTLE GAME!

Find the Challenges in the Neon Light Covered Jungle! Get all the characters and songs. Develop, complete the available tracks and new heavier trails open up in front of you. Grab your lightsaber and slash the cubes in the direction of the lights.


• more and more difficult levels
• enthralling sound and visual effects
• rhythmic movements
